text: João Paulo dos Reis Veloso (July 12, 1931 - February 19, 2019) was a Brazilian economist and politician. He was Minister of Planning between 1969 and 1979, and also was the President of the Institute of Applied Economic Research. He was born in Parnaíba. Veloso died on February 19, 2019 in Rio de Janeiro at the age of 87.Economista e ex-ministro Reis Velloso morre no Rio de Janeiro == References == Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Brazilian politicians Category:Brazilian economists Category:People from Piauí
title: João Paulo dos Reis Veloso
